title: Spanish broke 28 years old looking for room free, help pls
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Hi there, my name is Carlos, am 28 years old from Spain..  I will just honest, I am really struggling to pay my rent due the covid, I been working as bartender for 10 years, and this year I started in an electrical small company..  But don't have any hours..  I would help with the cleaning or what ever is need, thanks
